article_title: Wendy’s Announces New Marketing Chief, Management Changes
article_text:
Wendy’s Co. announced several management moves including a plan for a new chief marketing officer, with Brandon Solano slated to replace Craig Bahner early next year. Mr. Bahner has been in the role since 2012.

Mr. Solano, a veteran of Domino’s Pizza Inc. and Hershey Co., joined Wendy’s in July as Senior Vice President of Marketing.

...

article_metadata.author: Josh Beckerman
article_metadata.article.origheadline: Wendy’s Announces New Marketing Chief, Management Changes

article_summary:
Wendy’s Co. announced several management moves including a plan for a new chief marketing officer, with Brandon Solano slated to replace Craig Bahner early next year.
Mr. Solano, a veteran of Domino’s Pizza Inc. and Hershey Co., joined Wendy’s in July as Senior Vice President of Marketing.
Mr. Bahner has been in the role since 2012.
